task.title: How to Clean the Frozen Dessert Machine
task.shortdesc: The machine must be cleaned before it is used for the first time. The machine also must be cleaned after every use.

context.note: Do not use corrosive cleaning chemicals, put the freezer bowl in the dishwasher or submerge the motor base in water!!

step.cmd: Wash the lid, freezer bowl, and mixing arm with warm water and soap (see ).

fig.title: Parts of the Frozen Dessert Machine

step.cmd: Wipe the motor base (see ) with a damp cloth.
Dry the machine parts with a clean towel.
